subject: Football
Dementia
Concussions
Alzheimer's Disease
Pensions and Retirement Plans
lead_paragraph: Retirees have found that the National Football League’s disability plan, run jointly with the players union, is not structured to consider dementia to be an occupational risk.
snippet: Retirees have found that the National Football League’s disability plan, run jointly with the players union, is not structured to consider dementia to be an occupational risk.
